dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2140 IS: To improve the transition between experimental permits and commercial licenses for commercial reusable launch vehicles.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heinrich (for himself, Mr. Rubio, and Mr. Udall of New Mexico) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To improve the transition between experimental permits and commercial licenses for commercial reusable launch vehicles.

section.text: Section 50906 of title 51, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (e)(1), by striking suborbital rocket design and inserting suborbital rocket or rocket design; and
by amending subsection (g) to read as follows:

subsection.text: A permit may be issued, and a permit that has already been issued shall remain valid for the uses described in subsection (d), for a particular reusable suborbital rocket or rocket design after a license has been issued for the launch or reentry of a rocket of that design.
